document.full_text: after printing 3 billion copies of a new postage stamp bearing an image of the statue of liberty, the united states postal service received a strange question from a stamp collector.
document.title: oops! statue of liberty stamp shows las vegas lady
lines_and_colors: after printing 3 billion copies of a new postage stamp bearing an image of the statue of liberty, the united states postal service received a strange question from a stamp collector.
